condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Financing Agreement | Description :Unbundle operations and regulatory functions of ERA such that, withoutlimitation, DRMCs shall thereafter be legally and financially autonomous from ERA and operating as commercial entities. | Due Date:31-Dec-2010
